attributes.action: Make medication for mental health  free
attributes.additional_details: Because the cost of living is a struggle for many and many people also need the support and can’t afford some because the medication is expensive
attributes.background: Make all or most  mental medications available and free of charge to help people with disabilities and mental health issues

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund free regular prescriptions for mental health patients
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707406
